website_summaries.verdict: The Griffin Elevator laptop stand seems designed more for display than for ergonomics.
pros: materials are sturdy and look elegant
nonskid pads hold laptop and stand firmly in place

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop stand
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up and if necessary pack away. Sturdy stand and a good height. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bnz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This stand is simple and easy to put together. My laptop fits perfectly at the right height. I have purchased the wireless keyboard and mouse too so am now sitting comfortably at an ergonomic position at my desk which has resulted in less back pain so I am delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brandreth

customer_reviews.title: Good, well made and well price laptop stand
customer_reviews.text: Good, well made and well price laptop stand. Looks good and holds a number of different machines, and the rubber pads make sure none of them slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking stand, goes with my MacBook and other accessories. Really sturdy and easy to assemble. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Khanyie

customer_reviews.title: It's one of the most useful and space-saving designs i have come across
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time getting this model of laptop stand. It's one of the most useful and space-saving designs i have come across. I love that i can just stow an external keyboard beneath it. The height of the laptop platform, though not adjustable, is perfect for me. I have no problem recommending this. Delivery was very prompt too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: but not particularly sturdy. The parts only clip together
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but not particularly sturdy. The parts only clip together, so there's a bit of wobble, and an annoying amount of the whole laptop bouncing up and down while you type. Visually it looks quite nice, and the rubber grip is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alan McAlansworth

customer_reviews.title: A Little Star
customer_reviews.text: As far as I'm concerned this product 'stands up' to all it's claimed it will do - small compact enough to fit in your backpack with laptop, looks good and strong and set at a good desk height - good stuff and highly recommended by me.
customer_reviews.author: hagiasmos

customer_reviews.title: Could be higher
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for raising a laptop to help with posture issues. I however thought it could be higher as I still feel as though my laptop is too low. In future I would check the height before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: rebeccajayne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don't normally write reviews on Amazon but I felt that this product deserved one. I must say, wow, this stand certainly does look the part especially with my Macbook Pro 13", it's almost like griffin designed this stand for the Macbook. Great addition to my setup, now using my MBP as a secondary screen is much easier whilst also creating extra desk space. 5 star ***** :)
customer_reviews.author: Jmusic22

customer_reviews.title: If you use a laptop at a desk everyday get this.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than alternatives and every bit as robust. Forget about what people are saying that it's wobbly and your laptop will fall off, that's nonsense. Get yourself a wireless mouse and keyboard to finish the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this - it raises the macbook to the perfect height so your eye level is somewhere near the centre of the screen - massive improvement and essential equipment if you use your MBP or laptop on a desk, no more hunching over and poor posture.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: elevator
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered for the laptop as i was getting concerned about the cooling fans underneath it, it works well & raises it making it easier level to work seems stable as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the box. Also great stand for my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: J. Plum

customer_reviews.title: Bit slippery
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes my MBP slides forward on this stand. It could benefit from a grippier coating than the one it has.
customer_reviews.author: amerz

customer_reviews.title: Simple and smart
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to erect and does exactly what I wanted it to, which is to hold my 15" laptop at eyelevel. I have placed it on a table mat to make it easy to move back and forth. Unobtrusive and smart looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jenwoody

customer_reviews.title: POOOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality.. Legs on this stand are clumsy! I bought it as new but got my self used one I think.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Great product for 13" Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: My macbook pro fits perfectly on the stand and there is plenty of room to store things underneath. Its not big and bulky either.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 3 years now. Still same condition as when I bought. High build quality and laptop never slipped once!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it and would definitely recommend it to anyone who regularly works on their laptop it really transformed my laptop into a mini workstation. It's so easy to setup and once it's up you won't want to put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good solid build
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good solid build! Just a bit jiggly some times as the parts don't clip in they are slide in parts
customer_reviews.author: Andre Figueira

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Elevates laptop 18 cm and is of really solid quality. The grips to keep steady on table and laptop are really decent too. great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Rene Dekker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My laptop is higher than it used to be. Success.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch pope

customer_reviews.title: Good product, matches well with Macbook products.
customer_reviews.text: Basic product but serves a good purpose. Simple to assemble but possibly not quite high enough for a 13inch macbook pro.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Charles

customer_reviews.title: Stand
customer_reviews.text: Well worth getting and easy to assemble. Keeps your laptop cool. Would recommend it to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Stable, stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: I use this stand with my MacBook Air 13" and it works great. The right height, lightweight but stable and the fact that you can dismount it for travelling is also great. It has a couple of plastic hooks to hold the computer in place and it wont slide. I didn't rate it 5 stars because the piece that binds the whole think together is made of a transparent plastic that doesn't match the brushed aluminium stand.
customer_reviews.author: Anad4

customer_reviews.title: present for Valentine's day
customer_reviews.text: Cant really leave feedback as this is a present for Valentine's day. All I can say is arrived quickly in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: lottie09

customer_reviews.title: Very stable, smart & versatile...
customer_reviews.text: This stand / elevator works well with laptops upto and including a 17" widescreen MacBook Pro. Stylish, smart. Gives great air circulation and frees up an area under the laptop for pens, pencils, etc. Great item......... pity I've got to sell my photo-shoot model to recoup costs!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL PARKS

customer_reviews.title: Great simple stand
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. One of those times a simple design really works.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: A throne for my MBP
customer_reviews.text: Griffin elevator is good for variety of reasons. First - it looks great, second - it holds my MacBook Pro on a solid grip and third - I would never imagine how the elevator helps to utilise the space on the desk! My home studio looks just great.
customer_reviews.author: Wojciech

customer_reviews.title: Excellent functionality
customer_reviews.text: Together with an, this stand makes an excellent desktop "conversion" of your laptop, ergonomically preventing neck strains when looking down to the screen while sitting at the desk for hours. Not necessarily for use just with Apple laptops of course, but its simple and effective aluminium look fits MacBook Pros extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: giulio182

customer_reviews.title: Griffin Elevator laptop stand
customer_reviews.text: 15-year old son happy with the purchase, so I am too :) It arrived fairly quickly (during the postal chaos) and the packaging was good. A much better buy than many hugely over-priced similar stands but still enough for a simple "elevator" in my view.
customer_reviews.author: I. Gibbins

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better
customer_reviews.text: For the price this stand really couldn't be any better. There are some reviews of laptops sliding off the rubber pads. I haven't found this at all, the clips at the end of the arms prevent it from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: laptop stand - Griffin Elevator
customer_reviews.text: We bought this laptop stand about a month ago and are very happy so far. It gives plenty of space to put the keyboard underneath. It is also quite elegant and the transparency of it makes it less obtrusive on our desktop.It seems also reasonibly robust. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marine

customer_reviews.title: Solid, clean, and stable laptop elevator.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for my MacBook Pro 13". As I ordered this product I was slightly afraid that it would not be solid and stable enough. However, when the parcel arrived it felt heavy, which was a good sign as it is way better than I expected. It looks and feels very solid, and is also stable to keep movement of the laptop while typing (with external keyboard) to a minimum. It's very nice that there is storage space underneath the laptop to store, for example books or a keyboard. For those who also have a MacBook Pro (with aluminium unibody), it matches quite good as for colour (aluminium) and clean styling.
customer_reviews.author: Eelco van Iperen

customer_reviews.title: Disaster!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is a disaster, my macbook just slithers off at times. Not long ago I heard a crash, came rushing in to my study to find my macbook on the floor with a large dent in tit. Fortunately it still works but this stand is a nightmare. Just dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Yet again, Griffin have done it. A really fabulous product throughout. The build quality is weighty and doesn't look cheap with the macbook, like many aftermarket products seem to. It comes in nicely designed packaging and is a joy to put together. There simply is no other choice! Griffin's products seem to always exceed my expectations, I really trust them and will always buy their stuff first.
customer_reviews.author: Robbiectm88

customer_reviews.title: Griffin Elevator - Computer Lapton Stand
customer_reviews.text: My laptop is placed permanently on this now and it is just at the right height and allows me use it in unison with my monitor. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ste+Deb Cheshire

customer_reviews.title: perfect and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, beautiful and simple design, easy to assemble. So good I bought another one for my home office. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wizzo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, precarious, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I needed a stand to raise my MBP to alleviate some discomfort in my neck/back. I cannot recommend this item because although it does raise my laptop to the required height it feels quite unstable, as if the slightest knock would send my laptop to the floor. Sorry, but my laptop is a little too precious. I'll keep looking for something a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: itaddict

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver !
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things i have brought all year, i have neck and back problems so i really cant live without this stand now, i have tried other laptop stands in the past and this one is the best one by far x x x
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dennis

product_meta.title: Elevator-Computer Laptop Stand
product_meta.description: Elevates Laptop Screen 5.5" While Providing Valuable Desktop Real Estate For Your Keyboard And Mouse Keeps Laptop Cool With 360 Degrees Of Air Circulation Fits All Laptops, Mac And Pc Raise Yor Laptop Screen To Eye Level When Working On A Table Or Desk Aluminum Risers Raise Your Laptop And Create Desktop Space Non-skid Feet For Your Desktop
feature_bullets: Elevates laptop screen 5.5" while providing valuable desktop
Keeps laptop cool with 360 degrees of air circulation
Fits all laptops - Mac or PC
Conforms to health and safety standards
Recommends positioning the top of your screen level with your eyes and sitting at least an arm's length distance from the screen.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars40 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
